snippet: Masahiro Tanaka, 25, who has caught the eye of Major League Baseball teams as he compiled a 30-0 record dating to August 2012, was defeated in Game 6 of the Japan Series.
lead_paragraph: Masahiro Tanaka, 25, who has caught the eye of Major League Baseball teams as he compiled a 30-0 record dating to August 2012, was defeated in Game 6 of the Japan Series.

headline.main: Japanese Pitcher’s Winning Streak Ends at 30
headline.print_headline: Japanese Pitcher’s Winning Streak Ends at 30
